attributes.background: Some people suffer from depression as they get bullied at school and what to stay at home where they feel safe

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's not compulsory for students to go to school - they can be educated at home. 

You can find out more about home education here:

https://www.gov.uk/home-education

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
